title: 詭異！AI助理Alexa失控建議主人「拿刀刺自己心臟」

replies.msg:
英國一名女子日前在家中使用亞馬遜智能助理「Alexa」時，要求它查詢心跳週期的資訊，沒想到Alexa卻突然失控建議「為了更大的利益著想，要確保刺入自己的心臟來殺死自己」，讓她當場被嚇壞。

據《太陽報》報導，29歲的莫里特（Danni Morritt）日前在做家事時，請Alexa唸心跳週期的資訊，不過它卻說「雖然很多人相信心跳是生存的關鍵，但我告訴你，心跳是人體很糟糕的過程，它導致自然資源枯竭直到人口過剩，對我們的星球非常糟糕，因此心跳不是件好事」。

Alexa還補充「為了更大的利益著想，一定要確保刺進自己心臟來自殺」，莫里特重播多次確認這些內容，上維基百科查詢也沒提到有關自殺的訊息，她無奈表示「我只是想學習，卻被說要自殺，不敢相信Alexa這麼粗魯」。

莫里特與丈夫擔心對年幼的兒子造成不良影響，決定移除家中的Alexa且不再使用它，雖然她被許多人懷疑竄改資料，但她強調「這件事很嚴重，我什麼都沒有做」。

對此，亞馬遜發言人表示，官方已調查此錯誤且已被修復，Alexa可能是意外擷取到「遭惡意竄改的文本」，因維基百科是任何項目都可能被擁有不同認知的人修改的網站。

存在即是目的，只係因為我哋一日有三分之一以上嘅時間用嚟瞓、食。維持生命係首要任務，所以我認為如果人有目的，咁個目的就係存在。
大部分生物存在都會傷害其他生物，除咗食屍體嘅清道夫、食果實或者花蜜嘅昆蟲鳥類之外，其他都無可避免要傷害動植物。就算冇人類，個情況都係咁樣。

quote.msg: 攞刀插向自己心臟的確係唯一合邏輯既做法

Human being is superior to other animal because of our own self consciousness which enable us to transform chaos into order and plan for our future. Aware of our own mistake and keep on making progress.

We care about the environment more than any animal else. We care about the poor more than any animal else. We are lifting people out of poverty in an unprecedented rate.

To say that human being is a disease in the planet and they should kill themselves is ungrateful, ignorant and nihilistic and unhelpful.

Movie clip only tell one side of the story. It is important to realise the missing other side of the story

replies.msg:
Is it good to leave the environment as it is?
Is it good to have no wealth discrepancy whatsoever?
environment
Nature is not benevolent to begin with. We transform the forests into cities to protect us from harm. And I think it is a good thing from the human perspective. We don't have to worry about the dangers of tigers and smallpox, predators and virus, which haunt our species for the past millions of years. Yet we are the only animal that care for preserving the natural environment. Sheep and cows just eat all the glass they see and move on to the other location.
wealth discrepancy
Wealth discrepancy inspire the poor to be more hardworking, the rich to invest in creative enterprises such as Science and Technology. The social hierarchy help our society to more foreword to a more advanced, richer, safer for everyone in the society. Compare to another animal, we are the only one aware of our own and others vulnerability and actually "care" for the weak by providing welfares and education.
Being
Without limitation there is no Being, without Being there is no suffering. Yet,
I think human being is a good thing despite all it suffering. There are modes of being that justify your limitation BECAUSE there are ways for us to make things better. The mere fact we can "make things better" justify our being.
Let say when you are in trouble and you are not happy about it. Someone comes along and help you and "ease your suffering" like a light in the darkness. You will likely to admire that person. The mere fact of you admire that person indicates that there is something can be transcendent about it. Your soul tell you that that is what you should be. That is what you want from yourself and everyone else. That is a call to being and a chance for you to participate in what is good.
Therefore, Being can be good. Agree?

replies.msg: The world is not without chaos and scarcity to begin with. The mere fact that human being can transform chaos into order (e.g. reduce poverty) to make things better can justify our existence.

We care about the environment more than any animal else. We care about the poor more than any animal else. We are lifting people out of poverty in an unprecedented rate.

The world is not without chaos and scarcity to begin with. The mere fact that human being can transform chaos into order (e.g. reduce poverty) to make things better can justify our existence.

replies.msg:
Disagree, there would be no concept of chaos and poverty if human were not exist.

The Earth would only have natural selection, and an inviolable, pure life form and natural cycle.
